snippet.title: Martha Is Dead | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Uncover a dark multi-layered narrative that blurs the lines between reality, superstition, and the tragedy of war, explore a stunning recreation of the Italian countryside, and take photographs as you look for clues to discover the truth about what happened to Martha! 

Buy now: 
STEAM: https://wired.gg/MarthaIsDead/Steam
GOG: https://wired.gg/MarthaIsDead/GOG
EPIC: https://wired.gg/MarthaIsDead/EPIC
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10001528
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-gb/games/store/martha-is-dead/9pm6sjbmvqzl
Find a retailer: https://wiredproductions.com/games/martha-is-dead/#where-to-buy

Follow: 
Wired Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/WiredP​​
Wired Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WiredPro​​
Wired Productions Discord: https://discord.gg/wiredp​
Wired Productions Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wired_productions/

#MarthaIsDead
